heading: Sunday Night
text: Mostly clear, with some high clouds through NH. Lows from 5 above to 5 below. Northwest wind near 10 mph, gusting 15 to 20 mph over higher elevations.

heading: Monday (Groundhog Day)
text: More sunshine developing in the afternoon becoming mostly sunny by noon. Highs through the 20s.

heading: Monday Night
text: Mostly clear, then increasing cloud cover overnight. Lows in the single digits, a few negatives in the cold hollows.
